H0.text: What is the name of the sidekick of cartoon superhero DangerMouse. Penfold

H1.text: What is the name of the sidekick of cartoon superhero DangerMouse. Baron Greenback

H2.text: What is the name of the sidekick of cartoon superhero DangerMouse. Stiletto

H3.text: What is the name of the sidekick of cartoon superhero DangerMouse. DangerMouse

A4.text: Danger Mouse is a secret agent with the British Secret Service, and together with his sidekick Penfold is repeatedly ordered by Colonel K, the head of the Secret Service, to save the world.
